title: 關聖帝君一百籤第十五籤
subtitle: 張君瑞憶鶯鶯乙戊

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是關於婚姻的慎重與時機。詩中說「兩家門戶各相當」，指出雙方的家庭背景平等，並非單純依賴姻緣而較量。作者提醒說「不是姻緣莫較量」，不必急於立刻結合，而是要等到「直待春風好消息」時，才能「調琴瑟向蘭房」——象徵在適當的時機下，才可結合。這樣的建議強調的是等待與慎重，並非否定婚姻本身。
analysis.en: The theme of this poem is the prudence and timing in marriage. It states that "the two families’ doors and houses are equal," indicating that both sides are on a level playing field and that marriage should not be judged solely on fate or comparison. The line "do not compete over a union" advises against rushing into a partnership; one should wait for the favorable spring wind, symbolised by the phrase "wait for the good news of spring," before playing the zither in the orchid room, i.e. before the union is consummated. The poem therefore urges patience and careful consideration rather than an outright rejection of marriage.
analysis.jp: この詩のテーマは結婚における慎重さとタイミングです。「両家の門戸は相当である」と述べ、双方の家庭環境が等しいことを示し、単に縁や運だけで結婚を判断すべきではないと示唆しています。「姻緣を競わないで」と続けて、急いで結合を決めるのではなく、春風がやってくる好消息を待ち、琴瑟を奏でて蘭房へ向かうべきだと示しています。つまり、結婚自体を否定するのではなく、時期を待ち、慎重に行動するべきだというメッセージです。
analysis.reference: 唐。張拱(張珙)字君瑞。因事出蒲東。寄寓普救寺。寺之西廂。有崔氏母女居焉。即君瑞之中表親。女名鶯鶯。有絕色。會值流寇之亂。崔母許以。如能保護。願將女妻焉。君瑞出偽護持。乃免於難。後崔母背盟。君瑞思憶成病。識者謂其不出道所致也。

rag_analysis: According to the poem, the core meaning is that marriage should be approached with patience and equality:  • The first two lines describe two families that are equally matched in status and wealth, signalling that neither side has a natural advantage in a union.  • The third line advises to hold off on marrying until the metaphorical spring wind brings good news – a time of renewed hope or favorable circumstances.  • The last line shows that once the right season has come, one can freely “play the zither” and enter the orchid room, symbolising the joyful completion of a partnership.  • Overall, the poem encourages waiting for the appropriate moment rather than rushing into a marriage just because of social comparison or pressure.
